entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

[Fox VPN - Your Secure Gateway to Uninterrupted Connectivity] Fox VPN provides a seamless and secure network acceleration experience, empowering users to enjoy reliable internet access anytime, anywhere. Ideal for work, study, or entertainment, FoxVPN delivers efficient and stable connections with cutting-edge encryption and optimized performance. Our advanced infrastructure ensures lightning-fast speeds and minimal latency, supporting applications in gaming, video streaming, music, social media, business, and education. Connect confidently with just one click. [Key Features] High-Speed Network Optimization: FoxVPNâ€™s intelligent acceleration technology automatically selects optimal pathways, ensuring ultra-fast speeds and low latency for smooth streaming, gaming, and browsing. Military-Grade Security: Protect your online activity with advanced encryption, safeguarding your data from unauthorized access and cyber threats. Browse, work, and stream with peace of mind. Seamless Multi-Device Support: Compatible across PCs, smartphones, tablets, and more, FoxVPN lets you stay connected on all devices without compromising speed or security. Stable & Reliable Connections: Built on a robust global infrastructure, FoxVPN minimizes downtime and ensures consistent performance for uninterrupted productivity and entertainment. [Key Use Cases] Entertainment Scenario Kevin loves streaming movies and music but often faces buffering and connectivity issues. With FoxVPN, he enjoys ultra-fast speeds and stable connections, enabling smooth, high-quality streaming. Whether at home or on the go, FoxVPN keeps his entertainment experience seamless and buffer-free. Work Scenario Flora, a global marketing manager, relies on secure access to company resources while traveling. FoxVPNâ€™s encrypted connections ensure her sensitive data stays protected, even on public networks. The one-click acceleration feature guarantees reliable performance, letting her collaborate efficiently with international teams. Study Scenario Michael, a dedicated student, needs uninterrupted access to online learning platforms and academic tools. FoxVPNâ€™s high-speed connections and low latency allow him to attend virtual classes, download resources, and stream educational content without disruptions. entry.content:

Application Description

ã€ŒPaper - Live Wallpapers & 4k HD Wallpaperã€ ã€ŠPaper - Live Wallpapersã€‹ is a 4K Live Wallpaper that makes stunning photos for your phone wallpaper every day. This is one of the best wallpaper apps ever on the iPhone. All wallpapers are carefully selected by our team to make every background look beautiful, including 4K (Ultra HD|Ultra HD) and 5K (Full HD) wallpapers|backgrounds. Rich live wallpapers give the iPhone desktop agility while occupying as little system resources as possible. If you are still looking for a wallpaper application under iPhone, don't hesitate, "Paper - Live Wallpapers" is what you want! characteristic: â— Provide 20,000+ exquisite wallpaper materials (iPad contains 10,000+ wallpapers), which are continuously updated, so you don't have to spend time looking for materials. â— Live wallpaper, only supports when the iPhone device is set as the lock screen, press to display the live wallpaper effect. For systems above iOS 16.0, the dynamic effect will not be displayed after setting the dynamic wallpaper. â— Charging animation â— Desktop themes â— Zero app learning cost, simple interaction, and the pursuit of the best experience. â— The interface of Paper wallpaper is exquisite, comfortable experience, supports dark mode, extremely beautiful. â— We strive to simplify the application to provide excellent performance. Save battery. â— Constantly increasing live wallpaper themes: new wallpapers are added every week. If you have a unique live video wallpaper and want to share it with everyone, please submit it to us. Support one-click preview, 20000+ exquisite wallpapers are waiting for you. Happy! Happy! Install "Paper - Live Wallpapers" now and make your device screen amazing and interesting! This is the normal version. Certain functions will be restricted. The iPad&iPhone version does not contain live wallpapers. If you have any problems with the app or wallpaper, please contact us at ninthgame.team@gmail.com, we are happy to help you solve the problem. Please enjoy! Regarding Paper's automatic renewal: -After the purchase is confirmed, the payment will be credited to the iTunes account immediately. â€“ Automatic renewal can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period, otherwise it will be automatically renewed. -Account will be deducted for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. The fee depends on the selected plan. â€“ Users can manage subscriptions, and go to user account settings after purchase to turn off auto-renewal. â€“ Any unused part of the free trial period will be automatically invalidated when the user purchases the applicable subscription. The following three ways to purchase are now available to enjoy the right to use all wallpapers, updated daily, and no ads: â€¢ Subscription every 6 months â€“ $4.99 â€¢ Annual subscription with three-day free trial â€“ $8.49 â€¢ One-time buyout â€“ $12.99 Privacy Policy: https://artyli.github.io/privacy.html Terms of Use: https://artyli.github.io/terms.html If you need help, please contact us: ninthgame.team@gmail.com

entry.title: Cleaner One Pro - Uninstaller
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Unlock Full Versionï¼š$29.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

Cleaner One Pro is the all-in-one Mac Master Cleaner App. It can optimize your disk usage, free up space on your Mac, keep the hard drive clean, remove duplicate photos and other files, manage your apps, and much more. Fully compatible with macOS Monterey and Apple Silicon. PRIMARY FEATURES [Junk Files Cleaner] â€¢ Has Quick Disk Clean feature you can click from the Status Bar Menu â€¢ Clean temporary files, including logs, mail caches, iTunes and iOS temporary files, etc. Empty Trash for current user â€¢ Detect remaining files after deleting Apps â€¢ Clean Junk Files in removable storage on your Mac [Duplicate File Scanner] â€¢ Thorough and quick scan â€” fast and accurate scanning technique covers your entire home folder â€¢ Smart and Accurate Filter â€” duplicates are selected not only by file name but also by their content. Files are shown in detailed preview. Click the Auto Select button to help you decide which copy you wish to delete. â€¢ Easy and safe decision â€” duplicates can be sorted by file type and listed in their full route for you to track. You can decide which way to clean these files; either by sending them to Trash or deleting them permanently (In-App Purchase required) [Photo Manager] â€¢ Quickly find similar photos, blurry photos, and screenshots â€¢ Preview photos in groups after scanning â€¢ Organize your photo library â€¢ Easily remove photos that may be safe to delete to free up space (In-App Purchase required) [Intelligent App Manager] â€¢ Auto-clean leftovers of deleted Apps â€¢ Manage all installed applications with the All-in-One App Optimizer â€¢ Detect and remove leftover files of deleted apps with the App Manager â€¢ List all the applications installed on your Mac by name, size, and last opened date â€¢ Remove unwanted applications with Mac Disk Clean (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Remove all the associated files of uninstalled applications (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Added Vulnerability Scan in the App Manager to enhance security (In-App Purchase required) [Big Files Scanner] â€¢ 1-click scan of big files (customizable size from 10 MB and above) â€¢ Multiple filters of size, date, name and type â€¢ Local files in sync with your cloud drives can also be found * Important big files can be ""locked"" into the protected list to avoid accidental deletion [Mac Disk Clean Map] â€¢ Mac Disk Clean scans all your disk drives and creates a clickable map of the files on your disk, color-coded by type â€¢ Provides additional information about files when you click on an item on the map â€¢ View your entire disk by file or folder size to determine which files or folders use the most space with Clean Master [Real-Time System Status] â€¢ Real-time network usage â€¢ Real-time CPU usage â€¢ See detailed network and CPU information (In-App Purchase required) The paid version costs as little as $19.99 per year (this price may vary by location). Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled. â€” Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€” Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâ€™s Account Setting after purchase. â€” No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. â€” Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. â€” Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use Privacy Policy: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=PrivacyPolicy&VID=&Locale=en Terms of Use: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=EULA&VID=&Locale=en Please comment in the App Store and you can also email us directly at mac_support@trendmicro.com.

entry.title: TextSniper - OCR, Copy & Paste
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$11.99 â†’ $7.99 [$7.99 ~ $11.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

TextSniper is an easy-to-use desktop Mac OCR app that can extract and recognize any non-searchable and non-editable text on your Mac's screen. As an extra feature, it can turn OCR text into speech. It is a super convenient alternative to complicated optical character recognition tools. The tool is intuitive to use and makes extracting text from your images, scanned paper documents, PDFs, or even videos easy. No training or special skills are required, and it fits perfectly home and business Mac users. Easily accessible from the menu bar whenever you need it and has a simple user interface. If you have used a built-in Mac screen capture application before, it wouldn't be any trouble to work with TextSniper, too. Select with a mouse any part of an image, photo, PDF document, or anything on your screen, and the app will process and recognize any text within this selection. The text output will be saved into a clipboard so you can paste it into your favourite macOS text editing or note-taking software. Finally, the app's optical character recognition engine doesn't need an internet connection to process documents. Great OCR solution for those who are concerned about privacy. The application does not collect any users' data. Use Cases: â€¢ Convert different image formats to text (JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, etc.). â€¢ Pull text from a non-searchable PDF file without a need to process the whole document. â€¢ Read text from images, PDF documents, photos, Zoom meetings, or any other sources. â€¢ Copy text even when it is uncopiable, like in ebooks or web articles. â€¢ Quickly extract emails, links, phone numbers, etc. â€¢ Grab text or turn it into speech in video games. â€¢ Read QR or barcodes. â€¢ Quickly generate alt text from the screenshot for tweets. Features: â€¢ On-device OCR technology. No internet connection is needed. â€¢ Instant text recognition. No need to upload files into the application. OCR document or file on the fly. â€¢ High accuracy and performance in processing any documents. â€¢ Recognizes even tiny text on images with low-quality or dense background. â€¢ Customizable. Custom keyboard shortcuts to extract text with various options. â€¢ You can have TextSniper speak the recognized text whenever you need it. â€¢ Supports optical character recognition in multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Traditional and Simplified Chinese. â€¢ Running macOS Ventura: All the above languages plus Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese and Russian. â€¢ Running macOS Sonoma: All the above languages plus Thai and Vietnamese. â€¢ Running macOS Sequoia: All the above languages plus Arabic and Najdi Arabic. â€¢ Running macOS Catalina: English language only supported. â€¢ Use your iPad or iPhone camera to capture text from a photo or scanned document quickly. â€¢ Fully compatible with macOS Sonoma and optimised for Apple's M1-M3 chips.
